articles.author: Jon Hamilton
articles.title: African ancestry genes linked to higher risk for Alzheimer’s, stroke : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: A new genomic analysis hints at why African Americans face a higher risk of Alzheimer’s and stroke, but a lower risk of Parkinson’s.
articles.content: Black Americans are known to be at higher risk of some neurological disorders, and the reasons for this disparity remain unclear. Now, after examining the postmortem brains of 151 people, researchers… [+7763 chars]
